issue.title: Aborting ignition-transport windows job can cause future jobs to fail

content.raw: When I logged into the machine to inspect, an antivirus window was asking for permission to do some updates and reboot. I run that and after rebooting the problem was gone. It could be a hanging process or a lock by the antivirus. Let's keep an eye for the next time.
content.html: When I logged into the machine to inspect, an antivirus window was asking for permission to do some updates and reboot. I run that and after rebooting the problem was gone. It could be a hanging process or a lock by the antivirus. Let's keep an eye for the next time.
